mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id AS commentId, p.title AS postTitle, m.nickname AS nickname, c.content AS commentContent, c.created_at AS createdAt FROM community_comment c JOIN community_post p ON p.post_id = c.post_id JOIN member m ON c.user_id = m.member_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT c.comment_id, c.post_id, c.user_id, m.nickname, c.content, c.created_at, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_like cl WHERE cl.comment_id = c.comment_id ) AS like_count FROM community_comment c JOIN member m ON c.user_id = m.member_id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} AND c.is_deleted = 'N' ORDER BY c.created_at ASC

SELECT c.comment_id AS commentId, c.post_id AS postId, c.user_id AS userId, m.nickname AS nickname, c.content AS commentContent, c.created_at AS createdAt, c.is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM community_comment c JOIN member m ON c.user_id = m.member_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community_comment WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_like WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
